original_text: While John was still baptizing all the people, he also baptized Jesus. While Jesus was praying, the sky opened.
korean_text: 백성이 다 세례를 받을새 예수도 세례를 받으시고 기도하실 때에 하늘이 열리며

sentences.original_text: While John was still baptizing all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 아직 모든 사람들을 세례주고 있을 때
